activities:
Numera provides a cloud-hosted service to enable remote patient monitoring/telehealth and mobile personal emergency response services/telecare.  Our telehealth service connects to personal health devices to upload and transmit biometric information to care providers to assist patients in self-care.  Our telecare service collects information from a wearable personal sensor and communicates to call centers in the event of a fall or when the wearer wishes to call for assistance.

See Privacy Policy and Notice for full description.
contacttitle1: Vice President and Chief Security Officer
